state.title: hover
state.tooltip: Show previous advice || Click this button to show the advisor panel, along with the the last piece of advice you received. || You can choose to receive advice as text, audio or both by using the buttons to the right.

state.title: selected_down_off
state.tooltip: Show previous advice || Click this button to show the advisor panel, along with the the last piece of advice you received. || You can choose to receive advice as text, audio or both by using the buttons to the right.

state.title: active
state.tooltip: Show previous advice || Click this button to show the advisor panel, along with the the last piece of advice you received. || You can choose to receive advice as text, audio or both by using the buttons to the right.

state.title: selected_hover
state.tooltip: Hide advice panel || This dismisses the advice panel until new advice appears.|| You can stop or change the level of advice you receive by pressing the escape key, then Game Menu/Options/Game Settings.

state.title: selected_down
state.tooltip: Show previous advice || Click this button to show the advisor panel, along with the the last piece of advice you received. || You can choose to receive advice as text, audio or both by using the buttons to the right.

state.title: down_off
state.tooltip: Show previous advice || Click this button to show the advisor panel, along with the the last piece of advice you received. || You can choose to receive advice as text, audio or both by using the buttons to the right.

state.title: selected
state.tooltip: Hide advice panel || This dismisses the advice panel until new advice appears.|| You can stop or change the level of advice you receive by pressing the escape key, then Game Menu/Options/Game Settings.

state.title: down
state.tooltip: Show previous advice || Click this button to show the advisor panel, along with the the last piece of advice you received. || You can choose to receive advice as text, audio or both by using the buttons to the right.

state.title: hover
state.tooltip: Show chat window || The chat window allows you to send messages to other players during the game.

state.title: selected_down_off
state.tooltip: Show chat window || The chat window allows you to send messages to other players during the game.

state.title: active
state.tooltip: Show chat window || The chat window allows you to send messages to other players during the game.

state.title: selected_hover
state.tooltip: Hide chat window || If you receive a message from another player the chat window will open again.

state.title: selected_down
state.tooltip: Hide chat window || If you receive a message from another player the chat window will open again.

state.title: down_off
state.tooltip: Hide chat window || If you receive a message from another player the chat window will open again.

state.title: selected
state.tooltip: Hide chat window || If you receive a message from another player the chat window will open again.

state.title: down
state.tooltip: Show chat window || The chat window allows you to send messages to other players during the game.

state.title: hover
state.tooltip: Show player list || This displays all the players in the battle, which side they're on and whether or not they have voice chat enabled.

state.title: selected_down_off
state.tooltip: Show player list || This displays all the players in the battle, which side they're on and whether or not they have voice chat enabled.

state.title: active
state.tooltip: Show player list || This displays all the players in the battle, which side they're on and whether or not they have voice chat enabled.

state.title: selected_hover
state.tooltip: Hide player list || You can choose to show this again at any time.

state.title: selected_down
state.tooltip: Show player list || This displays all the players in the battle, which side they're on and whether or not they have voice chat enabled.

state.title: down_off
state.tooltip: Show player list || This displays all the players in the battle, which side they're on and whether or not they have voice chat enabled.

state.title: selected
state.tooltip: Hide player list || You can choose to show this again at any time.

state.tooltip: Show player list || This displays all the players in the battle, which side they're on and whether or not they have voice chat enabled.

state.title: inactive
state.tooltip: Show player list || This displays all the players in the battle, which side they're on and whether or not they have voice chat enabled.

state.title: hover
state.tooltip: Activate advice text||With this on, any advice you receive will be shown as text.||This setting will not affect your audio advice settings.

state.title: selected_down_off
state.tooltip: Activate advice text||With this on, any advice you receive will be shown as text.||This setting will not affect your audio advice settings.

state.title: active
state.tooltip: Activate advice text||With this on, any advice you receive will be shown as text.||This setting will not affect your audio advice settings.

state.title: selected_hover
state.tooltip: Turn off advice text||With advice text off, any advice you receive will not be shown as text.||This setting will not affect your audio advice settings.

state.title: selected_down
state.tooltip: Activate advice text||With this on, any advice you receive will be shown as text.||This setting will not affect your audio advice settings.

state.title: down_off
state.tooltip: Activate advice text||With this on, any advice you receive will be shown as text.||This setting will not affect your audio advice settings.

state.title: selected
state.tooltip: Turn off advice text||With advice text off, any advice you receive will not be shown as text.||This setting will not affect your audio advice settings.

state.title: down
state.tooltip: Activate advice text||With this on, any advice you receive will be shown as text.||This setting will not affect your audio advice settings.

state.title: hover
state.tooltip: Activate advice sound||With this on, any advice you receive will be played as audio.||This setting will not affect your text advice settings.

state.title: selected_down_off
state.tooltip: Activate advice sound||With this on, any advice you receive will be played as audio.||This setting will not affect your text advice settings.

state.title: active
state.tooltip: Activate advice sound||With this on, any advice you receive will be played as audio.||This setting will not affect your text advice settings.

state.title: selected_hover
state.tooltip: Turn off advice audio||With advice audio off, any advice you receive will not play as audio.||This setting will not affect your text advice settings.

state.title: selected_down
state.tooltip: Activate advice sound||With this on, any advice you receive will be played as audio.||This setting will not affect your text advice settings.

state.title: down_off
state.tooltip: Activate advice sound||With this on, any advice you receive will be played as audio.||This setting will not affect your text advice settings.

state.title: selected
state.tooltip: Turn off advice audio||With advice audio off, any advice you receive will not play as audio.||This setting will not affect your text advice settings.

state.title: down
state.tooltip: Activate advice sound||With this on, any advice you receive will be played as audio.||This setting will not affect your text advice settings.

state.title: hover
state.tooltip: Turn on voice chat || This will enable you to send and receive voice chat to other players with voice chat enabled. || You will need a mic to be able to send voice chat, but you will still be able to hear other players. || You can see who has chat enabled in the player list panel.

state.title: selected_down_off
state.tooltip: Turn off voice chat || This will stop you from receiving and sending voice chat to other players. || You can turn this back on at any time.

state.title: active
state.tooltip: Turn on voice chat || This will enable you to send and receive voice chat to other players with voice chat enabled. || You will need a mic to be able to send voice chat, but you will still be able to hear other players. || You can see who has chat enabled in the player list panel.

state.title: selected_hover
state.tooltip: Turn off voice chat || This will stop you from receiving and sending voice chat to other players. || You can turn this back on at any time.

state.title: selected_down
state.tooltip: Turn on voice chat || This will enable you to send and receive voice chat to other players with voice chat enabled. || You will need a mic to be able to send voice chat, but you will still be able to hear other players. || You can see who has chat enabled in the player list panel.

state.title: down_off
state.tooltip: Turn on voice chat || This will enable you to send and receive voice chat to other players with voice chat enabled. || You will need a mic to be able to send voice chat, but you will still be able to hear other players. || You can see who has chat enabled in the player list panel.

state.title: selected
state.tooltip: Turn off voice chat || This will stop you from receiving and sending voice chat to other players. || You can turn this back on at any time.

state.title: down
state.tooltip: Turn off voice chat || This will stop you from receiving and sending voice chat to other players. || You can turn this back on at any time.
